Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.21 Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Saraṇaduka » 8.21.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
66.
1911Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1912Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1913Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1914(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
67.
1915Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1916Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1917Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1918(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
